casebody.data:
DEASON
v.
OWENS-ILLINOIS, et al. No. 440P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2008. James A. Barnes, IV, Birmingham, AL, for Owens-Illinois, et al. Fred D. Poisson, Jr., Wadesboro, for Deason.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of September 2008 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of September 2008."
